title: Ethereal Emerald Chandbali Jhumkas - "Pachala Kempulu"
features: Exquisite Chandbali design featuring a floral stud transitioning into a layered cascading structure. The framework is intricately embellished with Polki diamonds set in a closed setting that highlights the gemstone's natural brilliance. The central Emerald is teardrop-shaped, adding to the piece's elegance. Dainty freshwater pearls sway from the base, completing the traditional yet modern look.
occasions: and elegant evening events. Also suitable for modern cocktail parties and celebrations.
description: These Emerald Chandbali Jhumkas showcase the finest craftsmanship of Hyderabad. The genuine Emeralds are a symbol of prosperity and good fortune. The Hyderabadi polish gives the gold a rich, timeless sheen. The delicate freshwater pearls add a touch of femininity. A perfect blend of tradition and contemporary design makes it a treasured heirloom.
